moapi.api

Class ModMappedOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • moapi.api.ModOption<java.lang.Integer>
      • moapi.api.ModMappedOption

  • public class ModMappedOption
extends ModOption<java.lang.Integer>
    Multiple Selector API with Integer -> String mappings
    Since:
    0.7

        public java.lang.String getDisplayString(boolean localMode)
